title: Maryland Local School System-County Crosswalk — lss_county_xwalk
Maryland Local School System-County Crosswalk — lss_county_xwalk
text: data frame 25 rows 7 variables: lss_number Local school system (LSS) number integer. lss_name Local school system (LSS) names. countyfp County FIPS code. countyns County GNIS code. geoid Unique county FIPS code (concatenation state county FIPS codes). county_name County name. Equivalent namelsad column mapmaryland::md_counties concatenated variable length geographic area name legal/statistical area description (LSAD) region Region state.

title: Maryland Public School Attendance (SY 2003-2022) — msde_attendance
text: Attendance data Maryland State Department Education (MSDE). #' original CSV data files downloaded MSDE available data-raw/extdata folder GitHub repo package. percent variables value 95 percent interpreted equivalent 95 percent. percent variables value 5 percent interpreted equivalent 5 percent. Chronic absenteeism data available prior 2018 federal Every Student Succeeds Act (passed 2015) went effect Maryland began include chronic absenteeism rate state's annual academic report cards. Variable definitions based definitions MSDE website.

title: Maryland Public School Attendance (SY 2003-2022) — msde_attendance
text: data frame 33,376 rows 18 variables: year School year academic year, e.g. 2019 2019-2020 school year school_number School number (0 indicates schools) school_name School name grade_range Grade range used attendance details. attend_rate_pct Attendance rate defined average daily attendance rate students school grade band, including special education students days_attended_count Total number students attendance first day school April 13th days_member_count Total number students registered attend first day school April 13th fewer_5_pct Percent students absentee rate percentage students absent school five fewer days first day school year last day school year fewer_5_count Count students absentee rate percentage students absent school five fewer days first day school year last day school year more_20_pct Percent students absentee rate percentage students absent school twenty days first day school year last day school year more_20_count Number students absentee rate percentage students absent school twenty days first day school year last day school year more_90_member_count Number students attendance rate 90 percent chronic_absentee_count Number students expected attend school least 10 days absent 10 percent school days enrolled school chronic_absentee_denom Number students expected attend school least 10 days school year chronic_absentee_pct Chronic absenteeism rate defined percent students expected attend school least 10 days absent 10 percent school days enrolled school date_created Date record created. lss_number Local school system (LSS) number integer. NA used place LSS number statewide data. Older LEA numbers combined LSS numbers dataset. lss_name Local school system (LSS) names (typically county name). "State" used place LSS name statewide data. Older LEA names combined LSS names dataset.

title: Maryland Public School Enrollment (SY 2003-2023) — msde_enrollment
text: Enrollment data Maryland State Department Education (MSDE). original CSV data files downloaded MSDE available data-raw/extdata folder GitHub repo package. number enrolled students includes ungraded special education pre-kindergarten students. Grades coded "Prekindergarten Age 4" MSDE data re-coded "Prekindergarten" facilitate comparison across years. LEA Names coded "Baltimore City - Edison" re-coded "Baltimore City", "Seed School LEA" "SEED", "Public Schools" "State". Variable definitions based definitions MSDE website. Last updated 2023-10-02.

title: Maryland Public School Enrollment (SY 2003-2023) — msde_enrollment
text: data frame 237,924 rows 10 variables: year School academic year enrollment count, e.g. 2019 data start 2019-2020 school year. school_number School number integer (0 indicates schools) school_name School name enrolled_count Number students registered attend school start year grade grade range integer. Typically enrollment count September 30. grade Grades Prekindergarden (PK) Grade 12 grade_range elementary school Grades, middle school grades, high school grades, grades (total enrollment). May also used label grade. race Race/ethnicity. Enrollment race/ethnicity available across grades years since 2020. "" used data prior 2020. date_created Date record created. lss_number Local school system (LSS) number integer. NA used place LSS number statewide data. Older LEA numbers combined LSS numbers dataset. lss_name Local school system (LSS) names (typically county name). "State" used place LSS name statewide data. Older LEA names combined LSS names dataset.

title: Maryland Student Mobility (SY 2003-2022) — msde_student_mobility
text: Student mobility data Maryland State Department Education (MSDE). original CSV data files downloaded MSDE available data-raw/extdata folder GitHub repo package. Mobility refers movement students one school another school year. Three types mobility calculated using student entrants student withdrawals: Total student mobility, entry mobility, exit mobility. Student mobility percentage students either enter withdraw school school year. calculate student mobility, number entrants added number withdrawals sum divided average daily student enrollment.

title: Maryland Student Mobility (SY 2003-2022) — msde_student_mobility
text: data frame 33,378 rows 14 variables: year School academic year enrollment count, e.g. 2019 data start 2019-2020 school year. school_number School number integer (0 indicates schools) school_name School name school_type School type (e.g. Elementary, Middle, High) mobile_pct Student total mobility rate entry_pct Student entry mobility rate exit_pct Student exit mobility rate mobile_count Sudent entry exit count entry_count Student entry count exit_count Student exit count avg_enrolled_count Average daily student enrollment. date_created Date record created. lss_number Local school system (LSS) number integer. NA used place LSS number statewide data. Older LEA numbers combined LSS numbers dataset. lss_name Local school system (LSS) names (typically county name). "State" used place LSS name statewide data. Older LEA names combined LSS names dataset.
